content.raw: Seems reasonable. I'm testing it now.

This is working for me; I've tested it on quantal, precise virtual machine, and my mac.

My only question: target to default branch only? Or can this go to 2.0 or 2.1? Maybe 2.1 since's it's like a new feature that doesn't break ABI?

content.raw:
Fix in 3bac491 (branch bullet2.82_scpeters). It seems that bullet is rounding the corners of boxes a bit. The failing test was checking for intersections with boxes very near the edge. Moving the ray sensor so it checks near the middle of the box fixes it. I'm planning to file an issue on this just to document the change in behavior.

UPDATE: filed #934 for this issue, and [submitted upstream](http://code.google.com/p/bullet/issues/detail?id=762).
content.html:
Fix in 3bac491 (branch bullet2.82_scpeters). It seems that bullet is rounding the corners of boxes a bit. The failing test was checking for intersections with boxes very near the edge. Moving the ray sensor so it checks near the middle of the box fixes it. I'm planning to file an issue on this just to document the change in behavior.

UPDATE: filed #934 for this issue, and submitted upstream.
